name: Bikry
headline: Bikry: Helping SMB's in India go online
description: Bikry App is a no-code platform that helps stores and services go online in India. We build them an online catalogue integrated with digital payments and pan-India delivery logistics within 5 minutes. Stores share their website and Android app link via Whats App and other social media channels to generate orders.

founders.name: Abhishek Bhayana, Founder
founders.description: Working in the local commerce domain in India at the intersection of e-commerce, SMB's, fin-tech and productivity tools

generated_description:
**Bikry: Your Gateway to E-Commerce in India**

Bikry is on a mission to empower small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in India to thrive online. Founded in 2020 and incubated by Y Combinator (W20 batch), Bikry started by offering a no-code platform that allows businesses to establish their online presence in just five minutes. Simply put, if you're a store looking to digitize, Bikry has you covered.

### What They Offer

At its core, Bikry provides an easy-to-use platform where businesses can set up an online catalogue that integrates digital payments and delivery logistics across India. Businesses can quickly share their website link via WhatsApp and other social media platforms to drive orders. This seamless experience extends to various industries, allowing everything from grocery stores to electronics retailers to create their custom storefronts.

Their features include:
- **Instant Setup**: Get your e-commerce site running in a matter of minutes.
- **Multi-platform Selling**: Sell through WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, and more.
- **Comprehensive Dashboard**: Manage products, orders, and payments all in one place.
- **Powerful Marketing Tools**: Share personalized banners, run promotions, and improve customer engagement.
- **Local Support**: Each user gets help from local e-commerce advisors.

### Team and Growth

Headquartered in Noida, India, Bikry operates with a dedicated team of 25 people. The company already claims over 500,000 stores active on its platform and holds a commendable 4.5-star rating on Google Play, highlighting its positive reception among users.

### Key Investors

Bikry has attracted significant attention and investment, including from Y Combinator, allowing it to scale its operations and refine its offerings.

### Platforms and Accessibility

One of the standout features of Bikry is its mobile compatibility. Users can manage their businesses on-the-go with a fully functional app, ensuring that no opportunity is missed. The website offers a plethora of resources, including FAQs that help new users understand how to make the most of the platform.

### Why Choose Bikry?

If you're a SMB in India looking to take the leap into e-commerce without the hassle of complicated setups, Bikry is your answer. They enable businesses to not only go online quickly but also to manage everything effectively from a single platform. 

**In essence**, Bikry isn’t just about selling online—it’s about transforming the way SMBs in India operate in the digital economy. Check them out at [Bikry.com](https://bikry.com/) and discover how to get your business online in just 30 seconds!
